main event: An extremely large meteorite or reentry of a space vehicle was observed passing through 50 degrees of arc from West to East.
interesting points: The object was incandescent and appeared to be three times larger than any previously observed meteor., The length of the burning trail was extremely long., The observation lasted for 2 minutes and 16 seconds., There were no decays reported for this date according to SPADATS., The case was ultimately resolved as a meteor observation.
sighted object: one large meteorite or reentry vehicle
